textAfterTable: 8 Songs Biography Born: 03 February 1925 Genre: Comedy Years Active: '50s, '60s, '90s Years before the emergence of Woody Allen, Garry Shandling, or Janeane Garofalo, there was Shelley Berman, the comic who singlehandedly transformed modern neuroticism into high art. Complete with both a unique, vignette-styled narrative sensibility and a mannered, sophisticated stage presence, Berman introduced a new breed of comedian — raw, intense, and deeply personal, his material reflected...
